attributes.action: Stop responding to petitions with bland negative platitudes, and instead initiate some definite action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nearly all Government responses to these on-line petitions comprise bland statements, with the basic message "the Government is not going to do anything in response to this petition". This needs to change if the whole concept of on-line petitions is to survive.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
